name: Hell Runner (Moonlight Studio)
description:
Check RoadmapDeliver The Necklace

Go through eight chapters to deliver the necklace to its rightful owner. Go through each level and try to beat it fast as you can. 

Chapters

Eight chapters: Hell, Underground, Spring, Summer, Fall, Winter, Sky, Heaven. Each Chapter gonna have nine levels for you to beat. In Early Access currently it have Hell and Underground.

TRAIN YOURSELF

Try to achieve the faster time possible for each level and beat others.

Why Buy Early Access

Hello there. Thank you for your attention. By buying this game now you doing three things. Firstly you become founder/supporter for the finishing the game. Secondly you become early tester and feedback source if you want and thirdly you getting it cheaper now compare to full released product. Finished product gonna have 8 chapters and 72 levels and hub place where it act like home for player where player can customize it and player character itself also main place to teleport to levels. Hopefully it gonna be cosy place to hang out. Also there gonna be multiplayer maps where you can race against other players and use environments as traps etc. 
Full price will be 20 dollar. 

Special Thanks

This game inspired by amazing parkour game SEUM: Speedrunners from Hell. 

SEUM Steam Store
